
# Cargar la base de datos Earquality y graficar con geom_line las temperaturas

```{r}
data(airquality)
ggplot(data = airquality, aes(x = Temp, y = Day)) + 
  geom_line(alpha = 0.4, color = "blue")
```
